llm_res.rule: ERC20 standard does not include taxation mechanisms.
Transfers of 0 values MUST be treated as normal transfers and fire the Transfer event.
llm_res.function: function _transfer(address from, address to, uint256 amount)

llm_res.rule: MUST trigger when tokens are transferred, including zero value transfers.
ERC20 standard does not include whitelisting mechanisms.
MUST trigger on any successful call to approve(address _spender, uint256 _value).
